segments.text: Over on the left, there's a different kind of drama playing out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little boy is precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks really wobbly; its legs are splayed out at an odd angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching deep into the open cookie jar in the cabinet above.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His other hand holds a plate, ready to catch the stolen goods, I assume.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's certainly got guts to climb up like that when no one's watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, she's standing right next to him, hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly an accomplice, patiently waiting for her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her eyes are fixed on that cookie jar, full of anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool could tip at any moment; it's swaying slightly, I think.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself or break the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so sneaky, I almost want to applaud their strategy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper, right under the adult's nose.
segments.speaker: PAR
